member.name: T:Votanic.vXR.vCast.Core.PanoramicHDRP
member.summary: Cylinderical Unwrapper transforms a normal perspective render to a cylinderical render. It utilizes an additional post process render pass through an intermediate material in the transformation. The class must be attached to the same game object with the target camera.

member.name: M:Votanic.vXR.vCast.Core.PanoramicHDRP.Awake
member.summary: Awake is called when the game object was created. It is always called before start.

member.name: M:Votanic.vXR.vCast.Core.PanoramicHDRP.Update
member.summary: Update is called once per frame.

member.name: M:Votanic.vXR.vCast.Core.PanoramicHDRP.OnValidate
member.summary: OnValidate is calls when the script is loaded or a value changes in the Inspector. This is editor only.

member.name: M:Votanic.vXR.vCast.Core.PanoramicHDRP.Setup
member.summary: Setup the paramates of camera and material according to the input parameters.

member.name: T:Votanic.vXR.vGear.vGear_Locus
member.summary:
Locus of vGear brush tool.
vGear 畫筆工具的筆跡。

member.name: P:Votanic.vXR.vGear.vGear_Locus.points
member.summary: Center points for the tube. Forward rotations will be calculated from the point at index 0 and upwards. The array is NOT copied; the tube will keep the reference to the array.

member.name: P:Votanic.vXR.vGear.vGear_Locus.radiuses
member.summary: Radius values for the tube. Each value corresponds to the point at the same array index. Array length must fit the number of points. If 'radius' has been set then 'radiuses' will be ignored. The array is NOT copied; the tube will keep the reference to the array.

member.name: P:Votanic.vXR.vGear.vGear_Locus.radius
member.summary: Radius for the entire tube. If 'radiusses' has been set then 'radius' will be ignored. Default is 0.1.

member.name: P:Votanic.vXR.vGear.vGear_Locus.colors
member.summary: Vertex colors for the tube. Each value corresponds to the point at the same array index. Array length must fit the number of points. The array is NOT copied; the tube will keep the reference to the array.

member.name: P:Votanic.vXR.vGear.vGear_Locus.edgeCount
member.summary: Edge resolution. Minimum is 3. Default is 12.

member.name: P:Votanic.vXR.vGear.vGear_Locus.calculateTangents
member.summary: Calculation of tangents. Default is false (to boost performance).

member.name: P:Votanic.vXR.vGear.vGear_Locus.invertMesh
member.summary: Mesh inversion (render the tube inside out). In most cases you should do 'Cull Front' in your shader instead. Default is false.

member.name: P:Votanic.vXR.vGear.vGear_Locus.normalMode
member.summary: How normals are rendered. Default is NormalMode.Smooth.

member.name: P:Votanic.vXR.vGear.vGear_Locus.caps
member.summary: Closed end points. Default is true.

member.name: P:Votanic.vXR.vGear.vGear_Locus.postprocessContinously
member.summary: Postprocess continously (if AddPostprocess has been called). When true, postprocesses will be called every update. When false, they will only be called when tube properties are changed. Default is true.

member.name: P:Votanic.vXR.vGear.vGear_Locus.uvRect
member.summary: UV mapping rect for wrapped tube body. Default is Rect(0,0,1,1).

member.name: P:Votanic.vXR.vGear.vGear_Locus.uvRectCap
member.summary: UV mapping rect for tube caps (if caps is true). Default is Rect(0,0,1,1).

member.name: P:Votanic.vXR.vGear.vGear_Locus.uvRectCapEndMirrored
member.summary: Mirrored uv mapping for cap at end point (points[points.Length-1]). Default is false.

member.name: P:Votanic.vXR.vGear.vGear_Locus.forwardAngleOffset
member.summary: Rotation offset around the tubes forward direction.

member.name: P:Votanic.vXR.vGear.vGear_Locus.mesh
member.summary: Get the tube mesh. Useful for combining multiple tubes into a static mesh. Do not manipulate directly.

member.name: F:Votanic.vXR.vGear.vGear_Locus.meshGizmos
member.summary: Draw gizmos for mesh normals and tangents. Default is false.

member.name: F:Votanic.vXR.vGear.vGear_Locus.meshGizmoLength
member.summary: Length of gizmos for mesh normals and tangents. Default is 0.1.

member.name: M:Votanic.vXR.vGear.vGear_Locus.ForceUpdate
member.summary: Force update to generate the tube mesh immediately.

member.name: M:Votanic.vXR.vGear.vGear_Locus.MarkDynamic
member.summary: Shortcut to Mesh.MarkDynamic(). Call this if the tube will be updated often so that Unity can optimise memory use.

member.name: M:Votanic.vXR.vGear.vGear_Locus.AddPostprocess(Votanic.vXR.vGear.vGear_Locus.Postprocess)
member.summary: Add a method to receive and manipulate mesh data before it is applied. Useful for creating distortion effects or complex variations.

member.name: M:Votanic.vXR.vGear.vGear_Locus.RemovePostprocess(Votanic.vXR.vGear.vGear_Locus.Postprocess)
member.summary: Remove a postprocess method that have previously been assigned using the 'AddPostprocess' method.

member.name: T:Votanic.vXR.vGear.vGear_Locus.Postprocess
member.summary: Method for passing mesh data.

member.name: M:Votanic.vXR.vGear.vGear_Locus.GetRotationAtPoint(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the rotation at point.
